Package com.github.cwilper.fcrepo.store.legacy

Implements LegacyFedoraStore.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
FileStore Provides read/write/iterate access to a set of files organized in directories.
PathAlgorithm Allocates relative paths for storing objects and managed datastreams.
PathRegistry Keeps track of the file paths of serialized objects or managed datastream content.
 

Class Summary
DBPathRegistry Database-backed PathRegistry implementation.
FilesystemFileStore A FileStore that works on the local filesystem.
LegacyFedoraStore Legacy FedoraStore implementation compatible with pre-Akubra versions of Fedora.
TemporaryDerbyDB A JdbcTemplate configured to use an embedded Derby database that is automatically created at construction time and can be deleted when no longer needed via a call to TemporaryDerbyDB.delete().
TimestampPathAlgorithm Timestamp-based PathAlgorithm compatible with Fedora's legacy lowlevel storage path algorithm.
 

Package com.github.cwilper.fcrepo.store.legacy Description

Implements LegacyFedoraStore.
